com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfHeaderFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfHeader
      • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfHeaderFont

  • public class RtfHeaderFont
extends RtfHeader
    Header definitions for font declarations.
